output: 
  word_document:
    reference_docx: docx-style.docx

```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}

if(class(table) != "list"){
  table = list(table)
}

table_name = NULL
for(i in seq_along(table)){
  if(is.null(table_name)){
  cat(paste0("### Table ",i,"."))
  }else{
  cat(paste0("### ",table_name[i]))
  }
  cat("\n")
  cat("\n")
  cat(knitr::kable((table[i])))
  cat("\n")
  cat("\n")
}
```
